type.name: org.gradle.api.BuildableComponentSpec
type.description: A ComponentSpec that is directly Buildable via a specified task.

method.name: builtBy
method.description: Adds tasks required to build this component. Tasks added this way are subsequently added as dependencies of this component's build task.

method.name: getBuildTask
method.description: Returns the task responsible for building this component.

method.name: setBuildTask
method.description: Specifies the task responsible for building this component.

property.name: buildTask
property.description: Returns the task responsible for building this component.
